==Summary==
After a miserable drizzling afternoon, bored with old military lecture-notes, Tolkien stated he has been working on his "[[Qenya|nonsense fairy language]]". He told [[Edith Bratt|Edith]] he longs to work on it but he holds himself back because he believes it "such a mad hobby".
